pr_title: HBASE-23993 Use loopback for zk standalone server in minizkcluster

timeline.bodyText: Test failure looks related to this one. Does the MiniZookeeperCluster need initialization before?
timeline.author: HorizonNet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -575,7 +575,7 @@ def assert_tablecfs_equal(table_cfs, table_cfs_map)
     end
 
     define_test "set_peer_bandwidth: works with peer bandwidth upper limit" do
-      cluster_key = "localhost:2181:/hbase-test"
+      cluster_key = MiniZookeeperCluster::HOST + ":2181:/hbase-test"

replies.bodyText: Thank you for taking a look @HorizonNet  ... Let me see.
replies.author: saintstack

timeline.message:
HBASE-23993 Use loopback for zk standalone server in minizkcluster

hbase-zookeeper/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/zookeeper/MiniZooKeeperCluster.java
 Have client and server use loopback instead of 'localhost'
